body.name: Chicco PhysioForma 100% Soft Silicone Mini One Piece Pacifier for Babies Aged 0-2 Months | Orthodontic Nipple Supports Breathing | BPA & Latex Free | Reusable Sterilizing Case | Clear, 2pk
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: Extra-light and ultra-small shield for a barely-there feel on newborn baby’s face
Developed for comfort, breathing and orthodontic benefits
Extra-soft, satin-textured silicone nipple to help baby stay latched and keep pacifier in mouth
Included reusable case for sterilizing pacifiers in just 3 minutes in the microwave
Designed and made in Italy. BPA and LATEX Free
body.description: Finally, a pacifier that soothes babies and parents too! Silicone Mini is an extra light, ultra-small orthodontic pacifier that was designed especially for newborn babies. Mini is 15% lighter and 10% smaller than our #1-selling/award winning silicone pacifiers. Loved by newbies - Mini has a 95% acceptance rate*. The Mini pacifier isn’t just for pacifying, but is also developed for comfort, breathing and orthodontic benefits. Clinical studies show that PhysioForma pacifiers actively support baby’s breathing by positioning the tongue forward to maintain an open airway, which is especially important during sleep. Physiological breathing improves quality of sleep and reduces irritability.The unique angle and lateral curve of the nipple evenly distribute tongue pressure across baby's palate. Tiny ridges and an inclined nipple shape guide proper tongue placement. Together, these important features support baby's growing palate and teeth.Gentle against baby's delicate skin, the soft silicone shield is comfortable and breathable. Ventilation holes promote air circulation & help reduce moisture buildup.One-piece silicone construction conforms to the American Academy of Pediatrics’ guidelines for pacifier usage. Another benefit of the one-piece design - parents can insert finger inside the nipple for extra bonding with baby.The exclusive PhysioForma nipple design was developed, tested, and approved in partnership with an advisory panel of leading neonatologists, pediatricians, and orthodontists.Available for babies 0 to 2m. Reusable sterilizing carry case included.*2019 consumer test on 127 babies in Italy, 0-2 months

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Perfect Fit for baby's comfort Our smallest and lightest shield for a barely-there feel on newborn baby’s face! Soft, flexible, high quality silicone pacifier is comfortable & breathable. Fits baby's little face perfectly & helps reduce moisture buildup with a contoured shield and 4 ventilation holes for air circulation. Plus, an extra-soft silicone nipple helps baby stay latched and keep pacifier in mouth - for more comfort & less slip! Exclusive Nipple Design for baby's breathing Clinical studies show PhysioForma pacifiers actively support baby's breathing. Our exclusive nipple (developed, tested & approved in partnership with an advisory panel of neonatologists, pediatricians & orthodontists) helps position baby's tongue forward to maintain an open airway. Orthodontic Design for baby’s oral development Unique angle and lateral curve of the nipple evenly distribute tongue pressure across baby's palate. Tiny ridges and an inclined nipple shape guide proper tongue placement. Together, these important features support baby's growing palate and teeth! One-piece Construction for safety and hygiene Made from one hundred percent food-grade silicone means there are no parts that can break apart & there is nowhere for germs to hide. One-piece pacifier adheres to the guidelines of the American Academy of Pediatrics. Another benefit of this design - parents can insert finger inside the nipple for extra bonding with baby. Included Sterilizing Case for cleanliness In addition to being handy storage for baby's pacis, you can also use the included case uses the power of steam. Our case lets you steam pacifiers in the microwave in just 3 minutes!

Accessorize your PhysioForma Chicco Pocket Buddies Soft loveys make the perfect snuggle buddies and keep baby's paci close by. Attach pacifier to hand, tail or store in the roomy belly pocket. Chicco Pacifier Clips Fashionable clips keep baby's pacis clean and within reach. Universal clips attach any style pacifier to baby's clothing, diaper bags, purses & more. Chicco Paci-Roo Storage Case Handy storage/travel case keeps pacis clean at home & on-the-go. Secure zipper & velcro strap for attaching to diaper bags, purses, strollers & more! Choose Your Favorite Buddy Cuddly Pocket Buddies are available in 4 friends: Bunny, Elephant, Fox & Bear. Perfect for the paci stage and beyond. Long lasting. Machine washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I typically prefer more traditional style pacifiers and not the silicone. But these are amazing. I have others that seemed too big for her mouth, like touching her nose, but these are a perfect for her face. And man can she get a grip on these, try to take it from her, I dare you. Because they fit so well and she can get good suction on them, they don’t fall out. A pro for the silicone they are easy to clean and you don’t have to worry about any water collecting inside them. Sterilize well in the brezza. I will definitely buy the next size up for her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The best pacifiers for infants. My daughter has used these since birth and they don’t cause teeth movement. Her teeth are so straight even at 14 months. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My 4 lb 12oz daughter can actually keep this pacifier in her mouth. I have bought multiple different pacifiers and this is the first one she can actually keep in her mouth without it falling out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Chicco PhysioForma 100% Soft Silicone Mini One Piece Pacifier is a highly regarded pacifier option for babies. This review aims to provide a concise overview of its features and qualities. The 100% soft silicone material ensures a comfortable and soothing experience for infants, with its flexibility conforming naturally to their mouth shape. The one-piece design eliminates small parts and potential choking hazards, making it a safe choice for parents. The physio-inspired shape of the pacifier promotes proper oral development, as it allows for the natural positioning of the tongue and even pressure distribution on the palate. Overall, the Chicco PhysioForma Mini One Piece Pacifier is a reliable and well-designed option for babies, prioritizing both comfort and safety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy the clear
reviews.reviewText: Baby likes this paci. I like that she can breath with it while lying flat and the size is great for her being newborn. It stays in her mouth and she can thrust it out if she is gonna spit up. It does discolor easily and require being replaced often.TIP: don’t buy the clear ones or you’ll be searching for it in the night. Also doesn’t have anything for it to attach a clip on. The holes arent great since it’ll rub on her face. I just wrappers the string in the front twice. Seemed to work surprisingly. The length was just perfect to double loop but it was just luck. It’s light so it’s not too heavy for newborns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Baby would not take
reviews.reviewText: We used mam for newborn pacifiers and wanted to like the advantage this one gave for airway safety but they are kind of long and did not work (gaged her)for my daughter who has a smaller mouth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter hated these but it’s not the products fault, she just prefers nuk orthopedic. I wanted her to love these because they seem much safer! The material is a soft type of silicone

reviews.reviewerName: Excellent results!  I love how my hair feels and how much more manageable it is!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good construction, single piece silicone. But TOO BIG for a preemie.
